EmailTemplate.subject: Private vs. Public
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Private vs. Public Chatter Groups provide users the ability to communicate information to an entire population of users (Public), or direct the information to a specific group of users (Private). Any user can join a public group, but must request and receive access permission to join private groups. To create a group, simply click on the Chatter or Group headers from your home page, select "Groups ", and then add yourself to a group or create a new group. If you're creating a new group, create your group's name and provide a brief description of the group's purpose. Indicate whether the group is public or private. Once you've created your group, you can add members by selecting "add group members" as well as set up group email alerts. It's that simple.
